actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee on Foreign Affairs discharged in House.
Measure laid on table in House, roll call #197 (314-90).

official_title: A resolution to direct the President to furnish to the House of Representatives information and facts regarding the United States decision to submit to the Government of Iran concessions as to United States conduct in Iran on or about March 25th, 1980.

summary.text: Directs the President to furnish the House of Representatives with information concerning commitments, admissions, and/or obligations made to the Government of Iran during March 1980.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the President to furnish to the House of Representatives information and facts regarding the United States decision to submit to the Government of Iran concessions as to United States conduct in Iran on or about March 25th, 1980.
